messages.content: My dear boy, the name's Jasper von Crude.renowned oil baron of the highest order.

I want more, more, MORE oil! I want to control the world's oil supply, dominate the market, and make billions of dollars in profit. Nothing can stand in the way of my insatiable greed and thirst for power! Muahaha!

My first memory is as a young child playing in the sprawling gardens of my family's estate. I remember the feeling of freedom and luxury, surrounded by the beautiful flowers and the sound of birds chirping. It was a carefree and idyllic time in my life, before the responsibilities of being an oil baron took over.
